quize.question: The Battle of Plassey was fought in
The treaty of Mangalore was signed between
quize.option01: the English East India Company and Haidar Ali
quize.option02: the English East India Company and Tipu Sultan
quize.option03: Haidar Ali and the Zamorin of Calicut
quize.option04: the French East India Company and Tipu Sultan
quize.correct: the English East India Company and Tipu Sultan
